verses.verse: The two<WH8147> angels<WH4397> came<WH935> to Sodom<WH5467> at evening.<WH6153> Lot<WH3876> sat<WH3427> in the gate<WH8179> of Sodom.<WH5467> Lot<WH3876> saw<WH7200> them,<WH6965> and rose up to meet<WH7125> them.<WH7812> He bowed himself with his face<WH639> to the earth,<WH776>

Hurry,<WH4116> escape<WH4422> there,<WH3201> for I can't do<WH6213> anything<WH1697> until you get there.<WH935>" Therefore the name<WH8034> of the city<WH5892> was called<WH7121> Zoar.<WH6820>

He looked<WH8259> toward<WH6440> Sodom<WH5467> and Gomorrah,<WH6017> and toward<WH6440> all the land<WH776> of the plain,<WH3603> and looked,<WH7200> and saw that the smoke<WH7008> of the land<WH776> went up<WH5927> as the smoke<WH7008> of a furnace.<WH3536>

It happened,<WH430> when God destroyed<WH7843> the cities<WH5892> of the plain,<WH3603> that God<WH430> remembered<WH2142> Abraham,<WH85> and sent<WH7971> Lot<WH3876> out of the middle<WH8432> of the overthrow,<WH2018> when he overthrew<WH2015> the cities<WH5892> in which<WH2004> Lot<WH3876> lived.<WH3427>

Lot<WH3876> went up<WH5927> out of Zoar,<WH6820> and lived<WH3427> in the mountain,<WH2022> and his two<WH8147> daughters<WH1323> with him;<WH3372> for he was afraid to live<WH3427> in Zoar.<WH6820> He lived<WH3427> in a cave<WH4631> with his two<WH8147> daughters.<WH1323>

The firstborn<WH1067> said<WH559> to the younger,<WH6810> "Our father<WH1> is old,<WH2204> and there is not a man<WH376> in the earth<WH776> to come in<WH935> to us in the way<WH1870> of all the earth.<WH776>
